column4: Hello. I am using Beryl with Edgy and whenever I go fullscreen on a video playback I get choppy video. Can anyone help?
if you are using ximagesink, that is expected since you are not using the hardware scaler
- Output is: "Autodetect" Whenever I run a video the CPU jumps right up.
set it to xvimagesink and click test
when you select it what does the Pipeline field say?
- I made a custom called xvimagesink. The "Test" button worked on that
are you using totem-gstreamer or totem-xine
that explains why gstreamer-properties does'nt work
Oh. How can I fix that then? :)
Nothing in preferences along the lines of xine/gstreamer
Thanks for your help I will play with it a little more tomorrow. Cheers.
